plot: Spotlighted are the works of three animators at the NFB: Caroline Leaf, Michèle Cournoyer, and Wendy Tilby.
title: Love in the Cold: Animation at the National Film Board of Canada
plot_es: Spotlighted are the works of three animators at the NFB: Caroline Leaf, Michèle Cournoyer, and Wendy Tilby.
original_name: Love in the Cold: Animation at the National Film Board of Canada
plot_en: Spotlighted are the works of three animators at the NFB: Caroline Leaf, Michèle Cournoyer, and Wendy Tilby.
